posts.author: 安根楼 发表于
posts.title: 上海建国医院医院口碑?老百姓都夸好_城市医院_城市公众论坛
posts.text:
生活变得很快，有一些男性有男人疾病的风险。我们有没有能力守住系统性风险的底线呢?一旦自己的健康底线被触及了。你就得注意了，我们要及时处置这些男科疾病。把男科疾病的风险总体控制住。同时我们也应该采取有效措施，把这些风险点逐步化解。
现在很多医院都可以看男科疾病，有的是综合医院，在治疗上技术上相对于专科医院来说，都有所不如。就像是您学习一门手术，到一家综合性的培训机构学习，绝地没有到专业性的机构学的好，这就是专业带来的效果。相同的，只有专业的男科医院治疗男科疾病才是专业的。
一家医院如果没有相关的资质看男科，那么，只能是一种非正规的男科医院，在收费治疗上都没有很好的监督机制，所以，正规的医院才能受到百姓的信赖。
全面的治疗技术是基础
好的男科医院当然有治疗男科疾病的好男科技术，一家男科医院的技术好，对男性的问题也能更好深入检查治疗，好的技术能够让男性朋友的疾病得到专业的诊断，得到专业的治疗，不用为了一种疾病跑遍各个医院。所以，男科技术全面是保障。
技术精湛的医生是核心
一家男科医院的医生是硬件，但是就像一台汽车，如果没有相应好的发动机，那么，汽车也就是一个废物，没什么用。所以，一家专业的男科医院，必须具备专业的男科医生，这是一家男科医院的灵魂。
医疗服务完善提升医院品质
贴心的男科服务：开通了网上咨询和网上预约服务、让男性看病更专业、更贴心，我院采用“一对一”绿色诊疗渠道、无烟输液室，使大家充分体验到“专业、严谨、专科和尊重”。
文章来源：上海建国医院 http://www.jsjgnkyy.com/ http://t.jsjgnkyy.com/

posts.title: BTS Group AB: Invitation to BTS Q3 2017 interim report presentation and conference call
posts.text: BTS Group AB: Invitation to BTS Q3 2017 interim report presentation and conference call Stockholm, Sweden, 2017-11-07 08:00 CET (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) --STOCKHOLM, SWEDEN - BTS Group AB (publ), a leading global strategy implementation firm, invites investors, analysts and journalists to a combined Q3 interim report presentation and conference call with CEO Henrik Ekelund. The report will be presented in English at Erik Penser Bank, Apelbergsgatan 27, Stockholm. The presentation can also be followed via the web with opportunities to ask questions. Conference call and web link: Tuesday, November 21 at 09.30 am CET. Please dial any of the following numbers:UK: +44(0)203 008 98 06US: +1 855 753 22 35SE: +46-8-566 426 90Follow the presentation via the link below: https://tv.streamfabriken.com/bts-group-q3-2017Venue:Erik Penser Bank, Apelbergsgatan 27, Stockholm.The report is published at 08.00 am CET the same day.The presentation will be available later on http://ir.bts.com/presentations.cfmFor more information, please contact:Michael Wallin Investor relationsBTS Group AB E: michael.wallin@bts.com T: +46 708-788 019About BTS Group ABBTS is a global professional services firm headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden, with some 500 professionals in 35 offices located on six continents. We focus on the people side of strategy, working with leaders at all levels to help them make better decisions, convert those decisions to actions and deliver results. At our core, we believe people learn best by doing. For 30 years, we've been designing fun, powerful experiences that have a profound and lasting impact on people and their careers. We inspire new ways of thinking, build critical capabilities and unleash business success. It's strategy made personal. We serve a wide range of client needs, including: -- Assessment centers for talent selection and development -- Strategy alignment and execution -- Business acumen, leadership and sales training programs -- On-the-job business simulations and application tools. We partner with nearly 450 organizations, including over 30 of the world's 100 largest global corporations. Our major clients are some of the most respected names in business such as Chevron, Citigroup, Coca-Cola, Microsoft, Salesforce, SAP, Tencent and Volvo Group. BTS is a public company listed on the Nasdaq Stockholm and trades under the symbol BTS B. For more information, please visit www.bts.comEvery care has been taken in the translation of this press release. In the event of discrepancies, however, the Swedish original will supersede the English translation.Attachment:

Durch den deutlich einfacheren Zugang zu Informationen haben Verbraucher heute jederzeit die Möglichkeit, sich aktiv über Produkte zu informieren. Zudem berichten diverse Nachrichtendienste in Rekordzeit über aktuelle Lebensmittelskandale und Produktmängel. Dies hat zur Folge, dass Produktionsfehler, Produktrückrufaktionen, etc. sofort wahrgenommen werden. Diese Änderung der Informationsgeschwindigkeit kann Unternehmen hart treffen, da der Konsument meist die Möglichkeit hat, sofort auf Substitutionsprodukte auszuweichen. Prominente Beispiele sind der Fipronil-Skandal 2017 (Insektizid belastete Eier) oder die EHEC-Epidemie 2011 (Darmkeime in Sprossen aus Ägypten).

Nun kommt es wohl doch zur Änderung der geplanten US-Steuerreform. Am Montag stimmte der zuständige Ausschuss im Repräsentantenhaus die Steuerbefreiung für Arbeitnehmer, die bei der Kinderbetreuung unterstützt werden. 
Die geplante US-Steuerreform hat eine Hürde im Kongress genommen. Ein Ausschuss im Repräsentantenhaus genehmigte am Montag, zu dem Gesetzentwurf doch wieder eine Steuerbefreiung für Arbeitnehmer hinzuzufügen, die von ihren Unternehmen Leistungen zur Kinderbetreuung bekommen. Für Arbeitnehmer mit geringem Einkommen, die Steuergutschriften in Anspruch nehmen, wurden indes Anforderungen ergänzt.

thread.title: 'Ndrangheta, appalti truccati nel Reggino: 50 arresti
thread.title_full: 'Ndrangheta, appalti truccati nel Reggino: 50 arresti

posts.author: desk2
posts.title: 'Ndrangheta, appalti truccati nel Reggino: 50 arresti
posts.text: 'Ndrangheta, appalti truccati nel Reggino: 50 arresti Inviato da desk2 il 7 Novembre, 2017 - 08:30 E' di 50 misure cautelari, tra incarcerazioni, arresti domiciliari e obblighi di dimora, il bilancio di una vasta operazione contro la 'ndrangheta per i condizionamenti sugli appalti di Brancaleone, un comune del reggino. Gli arresti sono stati eseguiti dalla Polizia di Stato e dell'Arma dei Carabinieri, con il coordinamento della Dda di Reggio Calabria. Le 50 misure cautelari sono per persone ritenute responsabili, a vario titolo, di reati che vanno dall'associazione mafiosa e dall'estorsione all'illecita concorrenza con violenza e minaccia, alla turbata liberta' degli incanti, alla falsita' ideologica commessa da pubblico ufficiale in atti pubblici ed alla violenza e minaccia a pubblico ufficiale. Alle persone coinvolte nell'operazione vengono contestati anche, sempre a vario titolo, i reati di associazione per delinquere finalizzata al traffico di sostanze stupefacenti, detenzione e porto illegale di armi clandestine e munizionamento e ricettazione, reati commessi, specificano gli investigatori, con l'aggravante del ricorso al metodo mafioso, ovvero al fine di agevolare la 'ndrangheta. Sono in corso anche diverse perquisizioni e alcuni sequestri di beni. I particolari dell'operazione saranno resi noti nel corso di una conferenza stampa che si terra' alle ore 11.00 nella Procura della Repubblica di Reggio Calabria. Categoria:

thread.title: Apple envuelto en en lío por transferencias millonarias a paraísos fiscales
thread.title_full: Apple envuelto en en lío por transferencias millonarias a paraísos fiscales

posts.author: redaccion2
posts.title: Apple envuelto en en lío por transferencias millonarias a paraísos fiscales
posts.text:
Estados Unidos.-Apple reorganizó sus subsidiarias en el extranjero para sacar provecho de los nuevos recovecos fiscales en la pequeña isla europea de Jersey, después de que se impusieran medidas más estrictas en Irlanda a partir de 2013, de acuerdo a un nuevo reporte del The New York Times y el Consorcio Internacional de Periodistas de Investigación.
La publicación y la organización investigadora sin fines de lucro citaron registros confidenciales obtenidos y compartidos por el diario alemán Suddeutsche Zeitung.
Los movimientos se dieron después que una subcomisión del Senado encontró en 2013 que Apple había evitado el pago de decenas de miles de millones de dólares en impuestos al utilizar paraísos fiscales. El diario dijo que Apple tiene 128 mil millones de dólares en ganancias provenientes del extranjero que no fueron gravadas por Estados Unidos.
Apple trasladó las direcciones fiscales de dos subsidiarias de Irlanda a Jersey, una isla autónoma ubicada en el Canal de la Mancha, entre Gran Bretaña y Francia. Apple no comentó de inmediato los reportes.
Fuente: Excélsior

thread.title: Samsung Opens 10 New Brandshops to Strengthens Retail Network in Bengaluru
thread.title_full: Samsung Opens 10 New Brandshops to Strengthens Retail Network in Bengaluru

posts.author: editor-manu-sharma (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Samsung Opens 10 New Brandshops to Strengthens Retail Network in Bengaluru
posts.text:
Samsung India, the country’s most trusted Consumer Electronics brand, announced the expansion of brandshops in Bengaluru to further increase its retail presence in the city. These outlets will enable the brand to create more touch-points for customers while tapping into the huge demand for Samsung’s innovative products in the region. 
The brandshops spread across 1,750 sq. ft. to 3,000 sq. ft. have been set up in high footfall areas such as Whitefield, Hebbagodi, Peenya, Banashankari, Ramamurthy Nagar, Jaya Nagar and Marathalli. All 10 outlets will be functional by end - December, making it the largest number of stores opened within three months. The stores will display the entire range of Samsung offerings – QLED TV, The Frame and other Televisions, FlexWash and other Washing Machines, Air Conditioners, Refrigerators, Microwave Ovens, Galaxy Note8 and other mobiles phone and wearables – thereby creating a one-stop shopping experience while reinforcing Samsung’s commitment to consumers.   “Samsung has always been at the forefront of driving innovation that aims at creating products catering to the evolving needs of consumers. The reception for Samsung products has been overwhelming and we have witnessed tremendous demand from Bengaluru which is one of the top markets for Samsung. The opening of 10 new brandshops will help us in reaching out to our customers at their convenience and also enable us to serve them better,” said Rajeev Bhutani, Vice President, Consumer Electronics Business, Samsung India. 
Samsung products are sold via retail outlets across the country, built through 22 years of strong partnership. A robust distribution network and healthy relationship with retail partners has enabled Samsung to sustain its market leadership in various product categories.

posts.author: beritasatu.com
posts.title: Jokowi Pasang Bleketepe Jelang Pernikahan Kahiyang
posts.text:
Jokowi Pasang Bleketepe Jelang Pernikahan Kahiyang Presiden Joko Widodo bersiap memasang "Bleketepe" dalam rangkaian prosesi Banjarsari, Solo, Jawa Tengah, 7 November 2017. (allseasons-photo)
 Selasa, 7 November 2017 | 16:25 WIB Solo - Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) memasangkan bleketepe sebagai rangkaian prosesi pernikahan putrinya Kahiyang Ayu dengan Bobby Nasution. Pemasangan bleketepe dilakukan di kediaman Jokowi di Jalan Kutai Utara, Banjarsari, Solo, Selasa (7/11).
Saat memasangkan bleketepe, Jokowi turut ditemani Ibu Iriana Jokowi, putra sulungnya Gibran Rakabuming Raka, putra bungsunya Kaesang Pangarep, Selvi Ananda yang merupakan istri dari Gibran, serta cucunya Jan Ethes Sri Narendra. Pemasangan bleketepe berlangsung sekitar 10 menit.
Bleketepe adalah daun kelapa yang masih hijau dan dianyam dengan ukuran rata-rata 50 cm x 200 cm. Bleketepe yang dipasang di tarub dan mengelilingi area untuk pernikahan, merupakan perwujudan dari suatu tempat pensucian di kahyangan para dewa yang dinamakan Bale Katapi.
Pemasangan bleketepe biasanya dilengkapi dekorasi atau hiasan dari tumbuhan, seperti pohon pisang raja, pohon tebu, daun beringin, buah kelapa gading dan lainnya. Pemasangan bleketepe dilakukan sendiri oleh orang tua mempelai wanita, sebelum prosesi siraman.

posts.title: La notalilia en verso
posts.text:
“EL ÉXITO DE MÉXICO, SERÁ MUNDIAL”. 
Y LOS INTERESES DE LA OPOSICIÓN, 
SE VE MENGUADA, APAGADA, OBSCURA Y ENCANDILADA… ANTE LA 
GIGANTESCA LUZ QUE ESTÀ LLEGANDO. 
Será tan grande el éxito de México, 
Primero en el país… y lógico en el MUNDO entero… por eso se està preparando UN COMPLOT, como lo ha dicho para él, LÓPEZ OBRADOR… 
En la HISTORIA DE MÉXICO, JAMÁS SE HABÍA DESATADO TAN SALVAJE…Y 
Destructivo Aquelarre, cacería de brujas, contra un Presidente de la república, y ¿saben por qué?… porque 
A él le toco, pudo haber sido contra 
FOX… O CONTRA CALDERÓN, pero como dijo FOX…. NO TUVIMOS PANTALANES PA ENFRENTAR LO QUE VENÍA… Y QUE HORA, ENFRENTA, EL 
GRAN PRESIDENTE… PEÑA NIETO… 
Al mismo tiempo que reconocía la cobarde actitud que ÉL Y CALDERÓN 
TUVIERON EN SUS SEXENIOS, AL GRADO DE DECIR, QUE VOMITABA… 
A FELIPE CALDERÓN Y RECONOCÍA A 
ENRIQUE PEÑA NIETO … POR HABER ENFRENTADO TODOS LOS RETOS Y NO SOLO EN LO QUE RESPECTA EL (TLC), 
SINO QUE TAMBIÉN EN LAS REFORMAS ESTRUCTURALES… Y LOS DESMEMBRAMIENTOS, QUE HA HECHO 
COMO EL DE LA PROFRA. 
“ELBA ESTER GORDILLO”, A QUIEN FELIPE CALDERÓN, PREMIÓ , CON UN PARTIDO POLÍTICO … EN VEZ DE ARRANCARLA CON TODO Y RAÍCES VENENOSAS, QUE TANTO HAN DAÑADO A MÉXICO … Y POR AHÍ VEMOS A “LÓPEZ OBRADOR”, INCITANDO A LOS REVOLTOSOS DE OAXACA, ENTRE OTROS ESTADOS COMO GUERRERO… QUE CON RESISTENCIAS DESTRUCTIVAS, HAN DAÑADO TANTO A LOS MEXICANOS… 
X 
Por todo esto y viendo que no han podido envenenar a la gente como ellos lo habían pensado en contra de 
“PEÑA NIETO”… QUE HA LOGRADO DAR AL CLAVO, CON TODO LO QUE HA HECHO… INCLUSIVE, EN CONTRA DE LOS CORRUPTOS DE SU MISMO PARTIDO… 
Todo lo que ha hecho PEÑA NIETO, EN VES DE DESPERTAR AGRADECIMIENTO ENTRE LOS VERDADEROS MEXICANOS… QUE NO ENTIENDEN QUE EL VENENO QUE VIERTEN… ENEMIGOS DE LA PAZ, VIENE DE LAS SERPIENTES VIPERINAS, 
QUE A TODA COSTA LE TRATAN DE QUITAR IMAGEN… A LOS QUE QUIEREN QUITAR DEL CUADRE Y QUE ESTÁN COLUDIDOS CON LOS DELINCUENTES 
ORGANIZADOS… 
ESTO; HAY QUE DECIRLO, PARA QUE SAQUEMOS AL PUEBLO DE ESA MALA HIERVA QUE ALIMENTAN CON SU CIZAÑA, LOS MALEANTES QUE PUESTOS DE ACUERDO… ALIMENTAN CON SU DINERO LAVADO, A LOS OPOSITORES DEL GOBIERNO A QUIENES NO LES IMPORTA NI MÉXICO NI SU GENTE… SOLO LLENAR SUS BOLSILLOS COMO LOS “ANAYA”, ASÍ COMO A LO HACE LA ESPOSA DEL HITLER MEXICANO , Y EL PERTURBADO DE LÓPEZ OBRADOR… QUE POR SU LENGUAJE INCENDIARIO Y LLENO DE LASCIVIA… INCITA A LA VIOLENCIA. 
LA OBLIGACIÓN DE LOS MEDIOS DE COMUNICACIÓN EN LA QUE UN 60% 
CAE EN LA DISTORSIÓN, Y EN LA DESINFORMACIÓN, ESTÁN… REGANDO EL VENENO DE LA MENTIRA LA FALSEDAD Y LA INSEGURIDAD, CONTRA ELLOS MISMOS Y SUS FAMILIAS… 
HAGO UN LLAMADO CRISTIANO, SI DIOS ES AMOR… ENTONCES, TODO LO QUE VENGA DEL MAL, NO PUEDE SER DE DIOS; PERO SI DE LA MALDAD…

thread.title_full: “Davvero”: Il trucco per insegare al cane a fare l’occhiolino

posts.author: Valentina
posts.title: “Davvero”: Il trucco per insegare al cane a fare l’occhiolino
posts.text:
Beauty & Wellness 7 novembre 2017 “Davvero”: Il trucco per insegare al cane a fare l’occhiolino 
Se siete riusciti ad insegnare al vostro cane come baciarvi a comando , allora riuscirete senza problemi anche nel triks per farlo ammiccare . Il trucchetto è molto semplice, basta armarsi di gustosi premietti. 
In pochi lo sanno ma toccando i baffi del cane, lui istintivamente chiuderà l’occhio dal lato corrispondente. Svelato il trucco per far che Fido faccia l’occhiolino a comando dovete: 
1. Pronunciare il comando, ad esempio “davvero”. 
2.Toccargli il baffo e quando avrà strizzato l’occhio premiatelo. 
Continuate con questa sequenza finché non comincerà ad ammiccare non appena sentita la parola d’ordine , senza più bisogno di toccare i baffi. Non aspettatevi che capisca subito cosa deve fare, starà a voi intuire il momento giusto in cui premiarlo. 
Ricordate anche che per essere efficace, il training deve essere percepito dal cane come un gioco . Quindi non lesinate con i premi, fate delle sessioni molto brevi e interrompete mentre è entusiasta dell’attività: al prossimo tentativo sarà più motivato a lavorare con voi.

posts.author: 花茶石榴
posts.title: 【图片】刘亦菲新片《烽火芳菲》上映，小演员李芳淙成功的吸引了我的注意【明星吧】_百度贴吧
posts.text:
刘亦菲的新电影《烽火芳菲》要上映了，但是我关注的焦点确是她的女儿……
海报中刘亦菲衣着简朴，神色坚强而又隐忍，一改往日清纯靓丽的形象，演绎一位命途多舛的寡妇：丈夫在战争中牺牲，女儿妞妞尚还年幼，不被社会尊重。战争造就的苦难全数压在了英子身上，看似柔弱的英子却坚韧地扛起了所有重担。饰演美国飞行员杰克的埃米尔·赫斯基则在海报中身穿粗布衣裳，手拿机枪，神色紧张地随时等待战斗的来临。妞妞在海报中则神情怅然，母女之间相依为命的亲情也令人为之动容。
这张海报上的人物是不是都很吸引眼球儿。几位主演都是熟人不用多介绍了，注意到影片中的妞妞了吗？她是我们北培的小演员哦！
妞妞（童年）是由小演员李芳淙出演的。说起李芳淙，她的演绎经历还真不少呢，在小演员中也是妥妥的实力派：李芳淙2009年出演儿童情景喜剧片《疯丫头》正式进入演艺圈，她先后出演过《老有所依》、《江山风雨几多情》、《小两口》、《妈妈向前冲》、《催眠大师》、《封神榜》等。
大多数观众应该是从《老有所依》中认识她的吧，拍摄《老有所依》时李芳淙通过全国众多小演员层层选拔，最终被赵宝刚导演钦点，与刘涛、张铎有大量对手戏。面对这些实力派演员，年仅5岁半的她丝毫没有胆怯，有很多情感爆发的戏都是一个镜头连续拍摄完成。李芳淙用自信和出色的演技得到了拍摄现场一次次肯定的掌声，赵导曾夸赞她是演技实力派。
这次跟刘亦菲合作演母女，相信李芳淙一样会带给我们惊喜的。
目前，影视剧是我们打发闲暇时光的主要途径，影视文化也越来越浓厚，喜欢表演的小朋友也越来越多了，你喜欢表演吗，你想像李芳淙一样拍影视剧吗，喜欢的话可以联系我们：北京电影学院（北京）培训中心，我们有专业的少儿部教师，寓教于乐，实战教学，你一定会喜欢的。

thread.title: Mínimos los delitos en autotransporte de pasaje y turismo
thread.title_full: Mínimos los delitos en autotransporte de pasaje y turismo

posts.author: Saraí Vargas Prieto
posts.title: Mínimos los delitos en autotransporte de pasaje y turismo
posts.text:
Rumbo al proceso electoral de 2018 “ni alzo la mano ni tampoco la bajo”, señaló Fortino Batres.
Mínimos los delitos en autotransporte de pasaje y turismo Saraí Vargas Prieto @saraireporta
Para el secretario general del Sindicato Flecha Amarilla, Fortino Batres Gómez el trabajo coordinado entre la Canapat y la SCT han permitido que los delitos en el autotransporte de pasaje y turismo sean mínimos.
Reconoció que han ocurrido algunas situaciones fortuitas en carretera, aunque no debería ocurrir ninguna, “la seguridad para los pasajeros tendría que ser al 100%”.
Informó que este año detectaron una persona que pretendía transportar sustancias ilegales o armas, “fue para el estado de Michoacán”.
Expuso que la empresa que representa tiene un equipo encargado de la seguridad, que está en red y en comunicación con las instituciones oficiales como la Secretaría de Comunicaciones y Transportes (SCT) y en algunos casos a nivel estatal.
“Ellos (las autoridades) están coadyuvando con la Cámara Nacional del Autotransporte de Pasaje y Turismo (Canapat) donde están afiliadas todas las empresas de este giro a nivel nacional.
Fortino Batres mencionó no tener la estadística sobre actos delictivos en este 2017, donde se haya visto afectado el sector del transporte de pasaje y turismo, pero insistió que “es mínimo, muy mínimo, por eso cuando fortuitamente pasa algo es noticia”.
Destacó que las medidas de seguridad que implementa el Grupo Flecha Amarilla ha dado buen resultado para prevenir cualquier tipo de acto delictivo, los arcos para detectar armas ha permitido encontrar algunos casos y posteriormente se hace la denuncia.
En lo que respecta al conductor, debe cumplir con una norma de no pararse en ningún lado, solo en caso de excepción como cuando hay un accidente o que la carretera esté en reparación.
“La norma que tiene que cumplir el conductor es servicio de terminal a terminal, es decir, desde donde sube el pasajero no se debe abrir la puerta hasta que llegue al destino que va”, apuntó Batres Gómez.
Subrayó que a la fecha han tenido 0 accidentes con defunciones, aunque sí ha habido pequeños incidentes.
Ni alzo la mano ni tampoco la bajo
Sobre sus aspiraciones, el dirigente sindical dijo ser respetuoso del marco legal y lo primero es aterrizar el proyecto del partido y después vendrá la etapa de los candidatos, donde al interior habrá un debate para elegir a las personas indicadas.
“Ya el partido y los mismos militantes decidirán quién será el candidato, ni alzo la mano ni tampoco la bajo”, señaló.

posts.author: 小喵睡睡
posts.text:
回复 蚊子的大树 的帖子
希望对你有帮助！
2016年开始各地区慢慢取消准生证办理，改为生育登记，建议电话咨询当地计生部门办理的流程。
准生证办理流程办理情况如下：
1、夫妻在孕期内到所在单位或村（居）民委员会办理妊娠登记，由专干向其宣传《计生条例》有关规定并发给生育证发放登记表。
2、夫妻按要求在登记表上填写基本情况，并由双方所在单位或村（居）民委员会签署意见并签名盖章后，向办证方单位或村（居）民委员会计划生育专干（以下简称村级专干）提交所需材料。
3、村级专干或本人在10个工作日内携带前项所列材料到发证机关申请领取生育证。
4、发证机关应在收到申请5个工作日内核定村级专干递交材料的真实性，并签发生育证。对难以确定真实性的材料，应进行调查核实，并在收到申请10个工作日内决定是否签发生育证。未签发生育证的，应书面说明理由。
5、村级专干应在发证机关决定后3个工作日内将生育证及结婚证、户口簿、居民身份证或未签发生育证的理由告知文书送交夫妻本人。

posts.title: Inilah Pengakuan Mengejutkan Sabar ketika Warungnya Ditinggali Imigran Afganistan
posts.text:
Inilah Pengakuan Mengejutkan Sabar ketika Warungnya Ditinggali Imigran Afganistan Berlantai paving, beratap terpal dan tak berdinding kain disitulah Husein tinggal bersama anak istrinya.   16:04 TRIBUN JATENG/MUH RADLIS Menurut Sabar, dari lima orang dalam keluarga tersebut, hanya anak sulung Husein yang mengerti bahasa Indonesia. 
Laporan Wartawan Tribun Jateng, Radlis 
TRIBUNJATENG.COM, SEMARANG - Sekeluarga imigran asal Afganistan terlantar di Kota Semarang selama sembilan hari. 
Mereka terlantar dan tinggal di warung mi ayam di depan Rumah Detensi Imigrasi (Rudenim) Semarang. 
Satu keluarga yang masing masing bernama Muhammad Husein (33), Qudsiah (30), dan ketiga anaknya Ali Khisoh (9), Ahmad (7) dan Ilyas (3) tinggal di sebuah warung mi ayam setelah ditolak tinggal di Rudenim lantaran kondisi penampungan di tempat itu telah kelebihan kapasitas. 
Di warung mi ayam tersebut, Husein dan keluarganya menumpang tidur. Apabila warung mi ayam buka dan melayani pelanggan, Husein pindah ke pos kamling tak jauh dari warung. Mereka terlantar dan tinggal di warung mi ayam di depan Rumah Detensi Imigrasi (Rudenim) Semarang. (TRIBUN JATENG/ISTIMEWA) 
Pemilik warung mi ayam, Sabar (51), mengatakan selama sembilan hari imigran tersebut tinggal di warung miliknya. 
Berlantai paving, beratap terpal dan tak berdinding kain disitulah Husein tinggal bersama anak istrinya. 
Apabila Sabar membuka warungnya, Husein mengajak anak istrinya pindah ke pos kamling yang jaraknya sekitar 15 meter dari warung. 
"Kalau saya buka warung, mereka pindah ke pos. Saya sering kasih mi, tapi ibu bapaknya tidak mau. Jadi yang makan mi ayam cuma anaknya," kata Sabar, Selasa (7/11/2017).

posts.text:
Frankreich beschließt Steueraufschlag für Milliardenkonzerne: Frankreich hat eine umstrittene Steuerreform ... 
Frankreich hat eine umstrittene Steuerreform verabschiedet. Ziel sind Zusatzeinnahmen in Höhe von fünf Milliarden Euro. Damit will das Land die EU-Defizit-Grenze einhalten und Vertrauen in Brüssel gutmachen. 
Frankreichs Nationalversammlung hat einem umstrittenen Steueraufschlag für Großunternehmen zugestimmt. Eine Mehrheit der Abgeordneten unterstützte bei der Abstimmung am Montag den Vorschlag der Regierung, mit einmaligen Steuerzuschlägen rund fünf Milliarden Euro zusätzlich einzutreiben. Damit soll sichergestellt werden, dass Frankreich in diesem Jahr die EU-Defizitgrenze ... Den vollständigen Artikel lesen ... posts.title: Pest Control Dubai
posts.text:
As 1980 Riviera Pest Control has helped businesses and homeowners across the UAE in controlling their insect problems. We have insect control operatives positioned in all parts of UAE to give you a guaranteed 2-hour response time 24/7 without exclusion 365 days a yr. At Riviera we delight ourselves in providing a professional, friendly & effective service offering advice on prevention & control of insect, animal pests & proofing of premises. We all give you a comprehensive variety of infestation prevention/control services to local & commercial premises at competitive rates and can design contracts to accommodate specific requirements. Riviera was created to provide high quality, professional, preventive & reactive pest control services. http://rivieraservices.com 
You can expect the most comprehensive non commercial pest control services around. Our methods and technology were created to support the longest lasting and most effective results for your home. Riviera Infestations Control services is dedicated to helping you to protect your valuable business against numerous pests. We all have been helping UAE businesses for over 40 years now. From providing advice on humane infestations control methods such as bird control and chicken proofing solutions, to animal control, our experienced experts provides a remedy to your entire needs. http://rivieraservices.com/services.html 
With regards to prompt, effective, and courteous service, you won”t find an improved option than Riviera Pest Control. We”ve been specializing in pest control in the United Arab Emirates for 20 years. Our technicians are highly trained specialists that use only approved products that are safe around your employees. All of us stop all pests and we have one of the better Each of our Services include: General Infestation Control, Pre-construction Termite Control, Fumigation Services, Rodent Control Services, Fly Control Program, Thermal Flogging Services, Free of charge Survey and Estimation.
Non commercial Services are usually standardised since most homes have common problem areas. The regular insect in residential areas are Bedbugs, Termite, Cockroach. To get this reason, it is often possible to get an approximate cost for a service over the phone. Nevertheless , we are only too very happy to modify a management program to suit any residential property based upon your budget and the results that you want to achieve.
In the event there is a parrot, insect, rodent or dog in your home, garden or outbuilding and you do not need it there, then it is a pest. Some smaller scale infestations can be handled by you using over-the-counter remedies but, unless of course used effectively (and the right product used on the right pest! ), the infestation will not go away. It is distressing and worrying to find you have a pest problem; some individuals feel embarrassed although like the majority of animals, pests are drawn to sanitation and “nice places”, just as we are, to raise their young. http://rivieraservices.com/blog.html 
All of us believe in offering a first class service to all our customers and back it up with:
Guarantees – all our work is guaranteed and if we do not do what we say we will, we will offer to pay another company to get the job done!
Avoidance advice – we also assume that an integral part of our service is making sure, so far as possible, that this pest problem doesn”t happen again. This kind of could be recommending changes to habits and possibly some parts of your home, or perhaps the used of equipment to stop the pest from returning.
Goods – we only use the best products we know are tried, tested and safe to sue around domestic properties, where households and pets live and play. http://rivieraservices.com/pest-control-dubai.html 
Survey – before we start any infestations control “job”, we comprehensive survey and examine the situation, looking to identify how the pest has gained access, as well as the evident task in hand of either getting rid of the pest completely or controlling it back to acceptable, “hidden” numbers in order that it will not encroach on or in to your property: http://rivieraservices.com/pest-control-services.html 
Commercial Services always require a custom-made approach and require a site trip to ensure that a cost -effective management solution can be quoted. Depending on the pest, commercial services often come with a regular maintenance set up to ensure that your premises stays pest free. Every business owner has a responsibility to employees and customer to keep their premises well-maintained and “habitable”, totally free of hazards and dangers that may cause personal injury. Under this comprehensive banner, pests are included. Riviera Pest Control may offer commercial businesses, office, facilities, restaurants, clubs, pubs, universities and hospitals a complete range of pest management options tailored to suit the needs of your business. Our aim is to resolve your vermin problem as quick as is possible while minimising disruption to your commercial operations. Our involved commercial pest treatment plan will help you remove rats, termites, cockroaches and other pests from your commercial business. Our objective it to protect your business from these harmful attacks. Our commercial checklist ensures we deliver quality, effective and permanent vermin solution services. When you have a commercial problem with pests, it is our responsibility to ensure you have a responsible, reliable and trust worthy insect management in place that won”t let you down.
We”ll provide a great, competitive and accurate quotation – without having hidden costs. Once we”ve agreed on the plan that is suitable for your needs, our skilled technicians will act quickly to treat the situation, eradicating all unwanted pests and safeguarding against their return. Our products are safe to work with around people, keeping your staff and customers safe. We care about the environment, this means all of our products come with the assurance of being environmentally friendly.
We can make rid of infestations from: http://rivieraservices.com/dubai-pest-control.html

posts.text:
• Website: www.24hours.com.vn Công ty Chúng tôi chân thành Cảm Ơn Quý Khách hàng đã cùng hợp tác với Chúng Tôi trong thời gian qua, Chúng Tôi cũng hy vọng sẽ được hợp tác lâu dài, bền vững với Quý Khách hàng trong thời gian tới. Qua thực tế công ty HAI TƯ GIỜ tự hào đã và đang được cộng tác, góp phần không nhỏ của mình vào thành công của khách hàng là các doanh nghiệp có thương hiệu lớn như đài truyền hình HTV, Công ty Viễn thông Quân Đội Viettel, Nokia Việt Nam, Công ty dịch vụ Viễn Thông Sài Gòn (SPT), Công ty TNHH San Miguel Việt Nam, Ngân hàng Hàng Hải, Ngân hàng Liên Việt, Ngân hàng Ngoại Thương Việt Nam, Công ty Cổ phần bánh kẹo Tân Tân, Công Ty Cổ phần phụ tùng Ô Tô Saigonpart, Công Ty Cổ phần Đầu Tư Kinh Doanh BĐS chuyên nghiệp, Công ty Cổ phần Giáo Dục Dân Xuân, Công ty Tư Vấn Du Học Thế Hệ Mới, Các hệ thống Siêu thị lớn như: Giant, Guardian, Mella, Lotte Mart... Cùng đông đảo các nhà hàng khách sạn tại tp.HCM và các tỉnh lân cận qua các dịch vụ sau: 
- Dịch vụ phát tờ rơi, phát POST, trang bị POSM, treo banner, băng rôn, dán poster khu vực TP.HCM, Hà Nội, Đà Nẵng, Cần Thơ và Miền Đông Nam Bộ ( Đồng Nai , Bình Dương ) ... - Design và in ấn, thiết kế, thi công toàn bộ bộ nhận diện thương hiệu (danh thiếp, tờ rơi, bao thư, folder, vỏ đĩa, catalogue, túi xách, đồng phục, ) - Thiết kế và thi công bảng hiệu, hộp đèn các loại biển báo quảng cáo. - Quà tặng dành cho cá nhân và doanh nghiệp: Tổ chức phát sampling, demo production, hoạt náo activation, tổ chức đổi quà, rút thăm trúng thưởng tại chợ siêu thị, cao ốc văn phòng… - Event planning, activation, roadshow, lễ tân , model, nhân tượng, pg, pb, mc, vũ đoàn, ban nhạc, nhóm múa, nhóm hài… 
- QA, QC. Khảo sát thị trường, tìm hiểu nhu cầu và thu thập ý tiêu dùng, giúp các doanh nghiệp có được các số liệu cần thiết để hoàn thiện và phát triển sản phẩm của mình cũng như đưa ra chiến lược marketing phù hợp. “ Một người làm vạn người hay ” 

Với phương châm "lao động là phải sáng tạo", đội ngũ gồm những người đứng đầu có kinh nghiệm, đầy tâm huyết và nguồn nhân lực kĩ thuật trẻ trung, năng động không ngừng học hỏi và sáng tạo, mạng lưới phủ sóng rộng khắp trong cả nước ( với hơn 700 nhân viên và cộng tác viên ) công ty HAI TƯ GIỜ luôn mong muốn đáp ứng được những yêu cầu công nghệ, kỹ thuật mới nhất trong ngành marketing, để làm thoả mãn nhu cầu của khách hàng, mỗi sản phẩm và chiến lược đều có những nét sáng tạo, độc đáo chỉ có ở HAI TƯ GIỜ. posts.text:
เรื่องนี้เกี่ยวกับ แบบบ้านชั้นเดียว . Bookmark the permalink . 
โพสนี้พาเพื่อนๆไปชม แบบบ้านชั้นเดียว ที่ทำจากอิฐบล็อคแดง เน้นการโชว์อิฐแบบเปลือยๆ ตัวบ้านชั้นเดียว รูปทรงหลังคาแบบหน้าจั่ว ภายในเป็นห้องโถงโล่งๆ ด้านหน้าของตัวบ้านทำเพิงยื่นออกมาเป็นส่วนของเฉลียงบ้าน ไว้เป็นมุมสำหรับนั่งเล่นแบบ outdoor ภายในตกแต่งด้วยเฟอร์นิเจอร์ง่ายๆ ขนาดเล็กพอเหมาะกับขนาดห้อง และในส่วนของห้องใต้หลังคาทำเป็นหองนอน เหมาะสำหรับทำบ้านสวน บ้านพักตากอากาศ

thread.title: Ini Kronologi Kecelakaan Karambol di Jalan Tol Krapyak. Tiba-Tiba Truk Colt Menghantam
thread.title_full: Ini Kronologi Kecelakaan Karambol di Jalan Tol Krapyak. Tiba-Tiba Truk Colt Menghantam

posts.title: Ini Kronologi Kecelakaan Karambol di Jalan Tol Krapyak. Tiba-Tiba Truk Colt Menghantam
posts.text:
Semarang Ini Kronologi Kecelakaan Karambol di Jalan Tol Krapyak. Tiba-Tiba Truk Colt Menghantam Truk colt diesel Z8411DK rusak bagian lampu depan samping kiri pecah, bodi samping kiri tergores, bak belakang miring.   15:52 TRIBUN JATENG/HERMAWAN HANDAKA Kecelakaan karambol melibatkan 2 truk dan 3 mobil di pintu exit Tol Krapayak Semarang, Jawa Tengah, Selasa (7/11). Dalam kecelakaan yang melibatkan tolal 5 kendaraan tersebut tidak menimbulkan korban jiwa. Inilah beberapa data kendaraan yang terlibat kecelaakaan Truk Fuso plat H 1737 DH, Truk pengangkut kobis Z 8411 DK, Daihatsu Xenia H 8734 MZ, Toyota Nava H 8603 EF dan Toyota Inova L 1930 AZ. 
Laporan Wartawan Tribun Jateng, Daniel Ari Purnomo 
TRIBUNJATENG.COM, SEMARANG - Unit Laka Satlantas Polrestabes Semarang , AKP Sugito merilis kronologi kecelakaan di ruas jalan tol km 0.00, tepatnya di jalan ujung tol Krapyak, Kota Semarang, Selasa (7/11/2017) pagi. 
Sugito mengatakan kejadian sekitar pukul 08.30 WIB. 
Sejumlah kendaraan yang terlibat berupa truk colt diesel Z8411DK, Toyota Kijang Innova L1930AZ, Daihatsu Xenia H8734MZ, Toyota Nav1 H8603EF, dan truk trailer Hino H1737DH. 
"Tak ada korban jiwa dalam kejadian itu," tutur Kanitlaka Satlantas Polrestabes Semarang. 
Tiap kendaraan mengalami kerusakan kategori ringan hingga sedang. 
Truk colt diesel Z8411DK rusak bagian lampu depan samping kiri pecah, bodi samping kiri tergores, bak belakang miring. 
Mobil Toyota Nav1 H8603EF rusak bodi belakang pesok, bodi samping kiri tergores, bemper depan lepas. 
Daihatsu Xenia H8734MZ rusak bagian kaca belakang pecah, bodi smping kiri belakang pesok. 
Mobil Toyota Kijang Innova L1930AZ rusak pada bodi belakang samping kiri ringsek, bemper depan dan bodi samping kiri pesok. 
Truk trailer H1737DH rusak ban belakang sebelah kanan sobek, spion kiri bengkok. 
Kronologi berawal saat pengemudi colt diesel melaju dari arah selatan (Gerbang tol Manyaran) ke arah utara (Krapyak). 
"Diduga pengemudi tidak bisa menguasai laju kendaraanya, sehingga terjadi kecelakaan beruntun dengan empat kendaraan yang kami sebutkan tadi. Empat kendaraan dalam posisi berhenti di lampu merah pertigaan," beber Sugito. (*) Tags

thread.title: Станции московского метро "Котельники", "Жулебино" и "Лермонтовский проспект" открылись для пассажиров.
thread.title_full: Станции московского метро "Котельники", "Жулебино" и "Лермонтовский проспект" открылись для пассажиров. // Advis.ru

posts.author: advis.ru
posts.title: Станции московского метро "Котельники", "Жулебино" и "Лермонтовский проспект" открылись для пассажиров.
posts.text:
Три станции Таганско-Краснопресненской линии московского метро — "Котельники", "Жулебино" и "Лермонтовский проспект" — открылись для пассажиров 3 ноября в 12:00. Как сообщает пресс-служба мэра, изначально предполагалось, что в обычном режиме они заработают утром 4 ноября. Однако после завершения необходимых проверок, связанных с безопасностью движения, поезда снова начали курсировать до "Котельников". С 28 октября они доезжали только до "Выхина" из-за строительства перегонного тоннеля для Кожуховской линии.
С 28 октября по 3 ноября для проезда от станций "Жулебино", "Лермонтовский проспект" и "Котельники" были организованы три бесплатных автобусных маршрута М, а также усилены действующие маршруты Москвы и Московской области. Автобусы курсировали по специально организованным обособленным выделенным полосам. 48 маршрутов автобусов Московской области были продлены до станции метро "Кузьминки". Всего в этот период по временным выделенным полосам на юго-востоке Москвы городские, пригородные и частные автобусы перевезли около 1,5 миллиона пассажиров.
Компенсационные автобусы будут работать до 15:00 3 ноября. После этого отменят временные выделенные полосы на улицах в районе Рязанского и Волгоградского проспектов. Начиная с 15:00 автомобилисты смогут беспрепятственно двигаться по бывшим выделенкам: камеры фотовидеофиксации будут отключены, все временные знаки и другое оборудование, которое использовалось для создания выделенных полос для движения компенсационных автобусов, уберут до 06:00 4 ноября. Кроме того, отменяются все временные перекрытия в районе закрытых станций.
Автобусы, работающие по маршруту Москва — Московская область и обратно, переводятся на свой обычный режим. Пригородные поезда начнут останавливаться на железнодорожной станции Выхино с утра 4 ноября.
Во время закрытия станций Таганско-Краснопресненской линии метро проводился постоянный мониторинг транспортной ситуации. Свыше 2,5 тысячи сотрудников транспортного комплекса и ГИБДД ежедневно работали над сохранением транспортной доступности района и занимались организацией комфортной перевозки пассажиров.
На время закрытия станций жители могли бесплатно добраться до центра Москвы на электричках, идущих до Казанского вокзала. Получить бесплатный билет на платформах Панки, Люберцы-1, Ухтомская и Косино можно было в специальных дополнительных пунктах. Всего за период с 28 октября по 2 ноября было оформлено порядка 60 тысяч бесплатных проездных документов. Также бесплатно получить транзитный билет для пересадки могли пассажиры, у которых был проездной документ до станции Выхино. Ее пригородные электропоезда проезжали без остановки.
Для удобства пассажиров на станциях метро "Выхино" и "Кузьминки" постоянно работали все кассовые окна. Дополнительно на пяти станциях метро организована работа мобильных касс по продаже билетов на одну поездку. Всего в период закрытия трех станций фиолетовой ветки продали порядка 55 тысяч таких билетов. Кроме того, у "Выхина" и "Кузьминок" пассажирам бесплатно раздавали горячий чай. Всего было выдано 4,3 тысячи литров чая.
В любое время пассажиры могли обратиться за помощью к дежурным сотрудникам транспортного комплекса, которые работали у закрытых и действующих станций Таганско-Краснопресненской линии метро. Они объясняли, как сориентироваться, и подробно сообщали о схеме работы общественного транспорта.
Строящаяся Кожуховская линия пройдет от микрорайона Некрасовка через районы Косино-Ухтомский, Нижегородский, Выхино-Жулебино и Рязанский. Розовая ветка будет примыкать к действующей Таганско-Краснопресненской линии: они пересекутся в районе станции метро "Лермонтовский проспект".
Кожуховская линия примет первых пассажиров в конце 2018 года. Ее протяженность составит более 17 километров. С запуском новой ветки метро станет комфортнее для пассажиров, которые пользуются самой загруженной на сегодняшний день линией — Таганско-Краснопресненской.
